transArray.content: The transportation is convenient, and it is convenient to go out. I read the reviews before, and they all said that the room was small. After checking in, it felt a little bigger than expected. The bed is also very comfortable. I looked around and looked at the nearby hotels with almost the same price. The beds in the big bed rooms are all 1.5m, and this one is 1.8m. The overall feeling of living is not bad, but the network is not good. It would be even better if the cleaning lady could wipe the dust on the window sill and the head of the bed. Oh, it is also very close to the nucleic acid point, which is also very important
